title: Arizona's biggest city has driest monsoon season since weather service began record-keeping in 1895
description: After a summer of extreme heat, the Arizona city is in the record books again.

title: Serbia's president denies troop buildup near Kosovo, alleges 'campaign of lies' in wake of clashes
description: A shootout that killed four people fired tensions in the volatile Balkan region.

title: Inmate accused of killing corrections officer at Georgia prison
description: A Georgia prison guard is dead after he was attacked by an inmate, official says

title: Nebraska is imposing a 7-day wait for trans youth to start gender-affirming medications
description: Nebraska trans youth must wait seven days to start puberty blocking medications.

title: Tim Wakefield, who revived his career and Red Sox trophy case with knuckleball, has died at 57
description: Tim Wakefield revived his career and Red Sox trophy case with knuckleball.

title: Trump expected to attend opening of his civil fraud trial in New York on Monday
description: Former President Donald Trump is expected to attend the opening of his civil fraud trial in New York on Monday.

title: At least 13 dead in Spain nightclub fire
description: At least 13 people were killed and several others were injured when a fire early Sunday ripped through adjoining nightclubs in Spain, authorities said.

title: A fire at a nightclub in Spain's southeastern city of Murcia kills 13
description: At least 13 people have been killed when a fire broke out in a nightclub in the southeastern Spanish city of Murcia

title: Vote to remove McCarthy over gov't funding would be 'destructive,' moderate rep says
description: Mike Lawler said the temporary funding bill to stop a government shutdown was the “only responsible thing to do” and blasted Matt Gaetz's push to remove Kevin McCarthy

title: Driver arrested when SUV plows into home, New Jersey police station
description: A New Jersey man is in jail on terrorism charges after authorities alleged he deliberately drove his SUV into a home and a police station.

title: Matt Gaetz says he plans vote to oust Speaker Kevin McCarthy after funding bill
description: Matt Gaetz plans a vote to try and remove Speaker Kevin McCarthy as punishment for McCarthy orchestrating a bipartisan stopgap funding bill to stave off a shutdown

title: Death toll in collapsed Zimbabwe gold mine expected to rise, vice president says
description: Zimbabwe's vice president says the death toll from a shaft collapse at a disused gold mine could rise to 13

title: Chicago is keeping hundreds of migrants at airports while waiting on shelters and tents
description: As Chicago struggles to house asylum-seekers, the city is using a shuttle bus center at O’Hare International Airport

title: Suicide bomber detonates a device in the Turkish capital. A second assailant is killed in a shootout
description: Turkey’s interior affairs minister says a suicide bomber has detonated an explosive device near his ministry while a second assailant was killed in a shootout with police

title: Populist, pro-Russia ex-premier leads leftist party to win in Slovakia's parliamentary elections
description: His leftist party won early parliamentary elections, staging political comeback.

title: Jimmy Carter turns 99 at home with Rosalynn and other family as tributes come from around the world
description: Jimmy Carter will put off his usual Sunday practice of watching church services online to instead celebrate his 99th birthday with his wife, Rosalynn, and their children, grandchildren and great-grandchildren in Plains

title: Powerball tops $1 billion after no jackpot winner Saturday night
description: The Powerball jackpot has climbed to an estimated $1.04 billion ahead of Monday night's drawing.

title: California governor rejects bill to give unemployment checks to striking workers
description: California governor rejects bill to give unemployment checks to striking workers
